double  fs,
double  tau,
double  zeta,
double  fzc 
) [inline, static]

Compute Zoom optics focus corrector open loop transfer function.

Parameters:
[in] nu frequency.
[in] fs sampling frequency
[in] tau time delay
[in] zeta dampling of zoom corrector
[in] fzc frequency of zoom corrector 
00034                     {
00035     const dcomplex s=2*M_PI*I*nu;
00036     const dcomplex fsovers=fs/s;
00037     const dcomplex Hint=fsovers;
00038     const dcomplex Hwfs=(1.-cexp(-1./fsovers))*fsovers;
00039     const dcomplex Hlag=cexp(-s*tau);
00040     const dcomplex Hdac=1;
00041     const double omega=fzc*2*M_PI;
00042     const dcomplex Hzoom=omega*omega/(s*s+2*zeta*omega*s+omega*omega);
00043     const dcomplex Hol=Hwfs*Hlag*Hint*Hdac*Hzoom;
00044     return Hol;
00045 }

) [inline, static]

Compute sodium power spectrum density.

alpha, beta are the parameters of the sodium power spectrum obtained by fitting measurement data at UBC.

00050     return pow(10,beta)*pow(nu,alpha);//we don't divide 2pi

double nafocus_residual ( double  fs,
double  tau,
double  zcf,
double  zeta,
double  D,
double  hs,
double  alpha,
double  beta 
)

Sodium tracking Openloop transfer function.

The cross over frequency (where gain is 1) have a phase margin of 45 (angle(Hol)=-135).

First find the frequency fc where phase margin is 45. then scale Hol to have gain of 1 at fc.

Written: 2010-06-15 Tested ok against RC's skycoverage code: 2010-06-15.

Parameters:
[in] fs sampling frequency of NGS
[in] tau zoom corrector time delay
[in] zcf zoom corrector frequency (Hz)
[in] zeta zoom corrector sampling
[in] D telescope diameter
[in] hs guide star altitude
[in] alpha parameter of sodium layer height PSD.
[in] beta parameter of sodium layer height PSD. 
00070              {
00071     int inu=1;
00072     double nu;
00073     double margin=M_PI/4;
00074     double aw=-(M_PI-margin);
00075     dcomplex Hol;
00076     double angle;
00077     while(1){
00078     nu=inu;
00079     Hol=nafocus_Hol(nu, fs, tau, zeta, zcf);
00080     angle=atan2(cimag(Hol),creal(Hol));
00081     if(angle>aw){
00082         inu++;
00083     }else{
00084         break;
00085     }
00086     }
00087     double nu1=nu-1;
00088     double nu2=nu;
00089     //true nu lies in between nu1 and nu2.
00090     
00091     dcomplex Hol1=nafocus_Hol(nu1, fs, tau, zeta, zcf);//>aw
00092     dcomplex Hol2=nafocus_Hol(nu2, fs, tau, zeta, zcf);//<aw
00093     double a1=atan2(cimag(Hol1), creal(Hol1));//bigger than aw
00094     double a2=atan2(cimag(Hol2), creal(Hol2));
00095     while(fabs(nu1-nu2)>1.e-5){
00096     nu=(nu1+nu2)/2;
00097     Hol=nafocus_Hol(nu, fs, tau, zeta, zcf);
00098     double am=atan2(cimag(Hol), creal(Hol));
00099     if(am>aw){
00100         nu1=nu;
00101     }else{
00102         nu2=nu;
00103     }
00104     }
00105     nu=nu1+(nu2-nu1)*(a1-aw)/(a1-a2);
00106     Hol=nafocus_Hol(nu, fs, tau, zeta, zcf);
00107     angle=atan2(cimag(Hol), creal(Hol));
00108     double gain=1./cabs(Hol);
00109     //We integrate over f, not f*2pi
00110     dmat *nus=dlogspace(-3,5,2000);//agrees good with skycoverage matlab code.
00111     double rms=0;
00112     for(long i=0; i<nus->nx; i++){
00113     nu=nus->p[i];
00114     Hol=nafocus_Hol(nu, fs, tau, zeta, zcf);
00115     const dcomplex Hrej=1./(1.+gain*Hol);
00116     const double NaPSD=nafocus_NaPSD(nu, alpha, beta);
00117     rms+=NaPSD*pow(cabs(Hrej),2)*nu;//we integratr f(nu)nu d(log(nu))
00118     }
00119     rms*=(log(nus->p[nus->nx-1])-log(nus->p[0]))/(nus->nx-1);
00120     double focus=sqrt(rms)*1./(16*sqrt(3))*pow((D/hs),2);//convert to focus error in meter.
00121     dfree(nus);
00122     return focus;
00123 }
